description:
One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy`s got his sights set on Moria, but he`d better hurry if he wants to save his crew!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Is the Enemy! The Ultimate Zombie vs. the Straw Hat Crew!
Luffy est notre ennemi ! Le plus puissant des zombies contre les pirates !
Teki wa Luffy!! Saikyou Zombie Tai Mugiwara no Ichimi
Враг – Луффи!! Сильнейший зомби против команды Соломенной шляпы
لوفي هو العدوّ!! الزّومبي الأقوى ضدّ طاقم قبّعة القشّ
敵はルフィ!! 最強ゾンビ対麦わらの一味
